column14: How much alcohol do you consume a week?
column15: At what age did you first gamble for money?
column16: Do you have friends who gamble?
column18: Have you bet more than you can afford to lose?
column19: Have you needed to gamble with larger amounts of money to get the same feeling of excitement?
column20: When you gambled, did you go back another day to try and win back the money you lost?
column21: Have you borrowed money or sold anything to get money to gamble?

column23: Has gambling caused you any health problems, including stress or anxiety?
column24: Have people criticised your betting or told you that you had a gambling problem, regardless of whether or not you thought it was true?
column25: Has your gambling caused any financial problems for you or your household?
column26: Have you felt guilty about the way you gamble or what happens when you gamble?
